Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
The teams that have strong DevOps practices are the ones best positioned to take advantage of the power of AI. See how you can use GitHub Copilot and AI Agents to bring speed, scale and security across the software development for your organization.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-AgenticDevOpsGitHubCopilot \* https://github.com/features/copilot?utm\_source=brk105-copilot-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://github.com/features/copilot?utm\_source=brk105-copilot-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://github.com/features/copilot/agents?utm\_source=brk105-agents-features-cta&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/concepts/agents/coding-agent/about-coding-agent?utm\_source=brk105-docs-coding-agent&utm\_medium=web&utm\_campaign=ghignite25 \* https://github.com/features/copilot/copilot-business ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Mario Rodriguez \* Luke Hoban ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event.
